name: Capital Ideas
tag_list: management-consulting, interim-executive, semiconductors, communications, software, internet, storage, computer-systems, energy-storage, smartgrid, renewables, cleantech, information-sciences
overview:
Capital Ideas is a management consulting firm serving high tech companies involved in the information sciences and cleantech.

Capital Ideas has a track record of helping to build high growth businesses that become industry leaders.

To identify and implement effective growth strategies, we look for creative ways to exploit disruptions in technologies, markets and financial structures. We have deep experience in all three of these areas.

Our goal throughout is to achieve growth in a capital efficient manner, while establishing sustainable competitive barriers around the opportunity.

Our industry expertise is information technologies (semiconductors, communications, software, Internet, storage and computer systems) and cleantech (energy storage, SmartGrid and renewables).

We do both strategy development and implementation, including taking interim executive or Board roles, when appropriate.
